Name: Name Change, Deputy Inspector Anthony J. Falco Square, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to a square name, Deputy Inspector Anthony J. Falco Square, Borough of Brooklyn.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

Deputy Inspector 		Classon Avenue		between Lafayette Avenue
Anthony J. Falco						and DeKalb Avenue
Square East

_________________________________________________________________

	Section 2.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

Deputy Inspector 		DeKalb Avenue		between Classon Avenue
Anthony J. Falco						and St. James Place
Square North

_________________________________________________________________

      Section 3.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

Deputy Inspector 		St. James Place		between DeKalb Avenue
Anthony J. Falco						and Lafayette Avenue
Square West

_________________________________________________________________


      Section 4.  The following street name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.
_________________________________________________________________
New name 			Present name 			Limits___________                     

Deputy Inspector 		Lafayette Avenue		between St. James Place
Anthony J. Falco						and Classon Avenue
Square South

_________________________________________________________________
      
	Section 5.  This local law shall take effect immediately.

2
